main: ^It is also known as The Real Fuerte de Nuestra Señora del Pilar de Zaragoza (Royal Fort of Our Lady of the Pillar of Saragossa). A 17th-century military defense fortress built by the Spanish colonial government in Zamboanga City built in order to drive away the pirates and raiders of nearby provinces by creating an outpost of Spanish armed forces.

c-0: ^It is now a sacred place for Roman Catholics housing a Marian shrine of the blessed Our Lady of the Fort Pillar and as a tourist spot.
